attributes.action: Charge MPs who refuse to report illegal immigrants with Criminal misconduct.
attributes.background:
Some charities have asked MPs not to act like honest UK citizens and report illegal immigrants to the undermanned hard-pressed border agency
Some MPs have even signed a statement to say they will not comply with UK immigration law
This is totally unacceptable conduct by members in public Office

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to investigate or charge people with crimes. This is the responsibility of the police.
